title: Brewster Rockit: Space Guy!
description: You don't have to be a Trekkie or own a lightsaber to enjoy this cosmic space parody.The brainchild of cartoonist Tim Rickard, Brewster Rockit: Space Guy! is woefully ill-prepared to be the captain of space station R. U. Sirius. Together with his bumbling crew of misfits, including Engineer Cliff Clewless and Science Officer Doctor Mel Practice, Brewster encounters a constantly challenging set of interplanetary anomalies that push the limits of space, time, and humor continuums.
author: Tim Rickard
